channel.title: cybersec charcha on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in cybersec charcha on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: Cybersec Charcha: Conflicts, Nation-States, and Cybercrime
item.description: In today’s edition of Cybersec Charcha, we’ll be exploring the growing role of Nation State Actors in cyberattacks, some important headlines from the past month in the cybersecurity space and some expert advice that we received on the last edition of Cybersec Charcha.

item.title: Cybersec Charcha: Understanding the booming ransomware industry
item.description: In the second edition of Cybersec Charcha, we are taking a deep dive into understanding the unregulated ransomware industry, what a ransomware attack means and the consequences it can have.

item.title: Launching CyberSec Charcha: IFF's monthly digital security update!
item.description: We are launching CyberSec Charcha, a free, monthly cyber security newsletter with a round up of the latest developments in digital security. Sign up today!
